title: Integration with OpenText products
content:
Service Management supports integration with the following OpenText products. For support matrix information about these integrations, visit the Integration Central website.

  • You can also use Connect-It to integrate with other products. For more information about the Connect-It configuration, see Integrate with Connect-It.
  • It's recommended to create a distinct user for each integration.
  • For all integrations that use OPB, you need to create only one integration user for the OPB agent to access Service Management.
  • An integration user that's defined in Service Management consumes a license unless it has the "Integration user" role defined in Suite Administration. 

You can integrate the suite with the following OpenText products.

Product Description Method Documentation

ALM Octane

Enables you to set up a bi-directional integration with Octane to submit Defects or Enhancement requests from Service Portal or other Service Management record types. The integration also allows to keep the data in sync in both systems.

 Integration Studio Integrate with ALM Octane
ALM/Quality Center

Enables you to set up a bi-directional integration with Quality Center to submit Defects or Enhancement requests from Service Portal or other Service Management record types. The integration also allows to keep the data in sync in both systems.

 Integration Studio Integrate with Quality Center
ArcSight SOAR Enables you to update cases in ArcSight SOAR. Integration Studio Integrate with ArcSight SOAR
Asset Manager Enables you to import demo data from Asset Manager. Integration Studio Integrate with Asset Manager
Connect-It Enables you to use Connect-It to integrate SMAX with other products. N/A Integrate with Connect-It
Core Content Enables you to embed a Core Content widget in Service Management so that users can manage documents in Core Content.  Integration Studio Integrate with Core Content
Core Content Enables you to index knowledge from Core Content. IDOL connector and OPB Index knowledge from OpenText Core Content
Endpoint Management Enables you to import devices from ZENworks into the UCMDB and the SACM module. Integration Studio Endpoint Management connector
Extended ECM Enables you to index knowledge from Extended ECM repositories. IDOL connector and OPB Index knowledge from OpenText Extended ECM
HCM Enables you to do the following:
  • VM provisioning in HCM via SMAX Service Portal
  • VM provisioning failure handling in Service Management-HCM
 OPB Integrate with HCM
Operations Bridge Manager (OBM) Enables you to create and update incidents in Service Management based on events in Operations Bridge Manager (OBM).

OPB and External Systems

To set up the integration, see Integrate with Operations Bridge Manager (OBM).

For information on external configurations, which you can use to simplify the integration, see External configurations.
Operations Orchestration (OO) Enables you to import content from Operations Orchestration so you can run the imported flows as an automatic task in a record.

OPB

To perform the integration, see How to perform an integration with Operations Orchestration.

To set up encryption for the integration, see How to set up encryption for an Operations Orchestration integration.

For a use case example, see Operations Orchestration integration use case.
Operations Orchestration RAS (OO RAS) OO RAS interacts with OO Central and polls it for operations to run. Operations Orchestration Integrate with Operations Orchestration RAS
PPM Outbound Integration

Enables you to send Service Management ideas and proposals to Project and Portfolio Management (PPM).

The SMAX-PPM integration through the PPM Outbound Integration endpoint is deprecated and will be obsoleted in a future release. Use the Integration Studio-based PPM integration instead.

OPB

 Integration with Project and Portfolio Management (PPM)
Service Manager Enables you to exchange incidents and requests between Service Management and Service Manager. 

External Systems

For an overview of the SM integration, see External systems - Service Manager integration.

To perform the integration, add Service Manager as an external system. For more information, see Working with external systems.

For detailed integration scenarios for incidents, see Case Exchange integration for incidents.
For detailed integration scenarios for requests, see Case Exchange integration for requests.
Service Manager Enables you to move data from Service Manager to Service Management. Integration Studio Integrate with Service Manager
SMAX Enables you to move knowledge articles and do case exchange between two SMAX tenants. Integration Studio Integrate with SMAX
Strategic Portfolio Management (ValueEdge Strategy)/PPM Enables you to create Epics in SPM or Proposals in PPM for Service Management Ideas. It also enables you to create projects in PPM for Service Management Proposals.  Integration Studio Integration with SPM/PPM
UCMDB Enables you to synchronize configuration item (CI) data from UCMDB with Service Management.

OPB

Native SACM

Integrate with UCMDB

Native SACM
ZENworks Enables you to import devices from ZENworks into the UCMDB and the SACM module. Integration Studio Integrate with ZENworks
